column1: Finance and Investment Management (with CFA Level 1 Examination) MScEcon
column5: Aberdeen is well known for its expertise in these two areas and it offers two complementary disciplines offering you the opportunity to take the leading professional finance qualification, CFA level 1, during the course. If you do not wish to take the CFA exam there is an alternative research-based programme.
column7: View the programme page for your course fees
column9: 12 Months Full Time 24 Months Part Time
